Backend Developer (Node.js or Django) Job at Briskit Agency




        
    

        
        Briskit Agency is a full-service advertising and marketing agency. With over 5+ years of experience, we deliver creative thinking, tailored solutions and innovative strategies that help our clients achieve their business goals. Our strategic thinkers work with clients to develop the most effective campaigns, from strategy development to digital marketing tactics.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Backend Developer (Node.js or Django)

Job Location: Lagos

Overview
     

            
    




	Briskit Agency is looking for a Backend Developer to architect and implement the backend infrastructure for a feature-rich reporting and workflow platform.
	You'll be responsible for handling user roles, data management, APIs, file uploads, requisitions, and more.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop secure, scalable RESTful APIs using Node.js (Express) or Django
	Implement user authentication with JWT and RBAC for multiple roles
	Build modules for requisitions, campaign lifecycle, vendor management, wallet transactions, and reporting
	Integrate third-party APIs and Firebase notification services
	Handle file uploads and data validations with proper storage logic
	Write unit and integration tests; maintain clean, documented code.


Requirements


	3+ years of backend development experience (Node.js or Django)
	Strong understanding of API design and data modeling
	Experience with PostgreSQL or similar relational databases
	Familiar with Docker, cloud hosting (AWS/DigitalOcean), and DevOps tools
	Proficiency in Git, version control, and Agile methodologies
	Experience with file handling, chat/messaging systems, and performance optimization.


Compensation & Engagement Terms


	Project-Based Employment - We pay monthly per project per duration of any project.
	Monthly Pay: N200,000 - N250,000 (based on experience and performance)
	Total Contract Value: N600,000 - N750,000
	Work Arrangement: Hybrid – 2 days onsite and 3 days remote per week.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Portfolio / Resume to: hr@briskita.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	For more enquiries, contact via WhatsApp: +2349056982257
	This is a contract-based hybrid role for the duration of the project, with potential for extension or long-term engagement based on performance and future needs at Briskit Agency.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Logistics Officer (Vehicle & Delivery Coordination)",
  "description": "Runola is a parent company with four subsidiaries (AdelooSuites, Runoplast, Runoclean, and RunoFeed)committed to delivering high-quality products and services to our customers. With a strong focus on innovation, efficiency, and excellence, we have established ourselves as a trusted name in the industry.

Our company operates across multiple locations, ensuring seamless production and service delivery while upholding the highest standards of professionalism. We value teamwork, integrity, and continuous growth, providing our employees with opportunities to excel in their careers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics Officer (Vehicle &amp; Delivery Coordination)

Job Location:&nbsp;Asaba, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are currently hiring a Logistics Officer to manage and coordinate our company vehicles and act as the liaison between our delivery drivers and management.


Key Responsibilities


	Schedule and track deliveries and vehicle assignments
	Supervise company drivers and ensure timely delivery of goods
	Monitor vehicle maintenance and ensure all documents are up-to-date
	Act as the link between drivers and the operations team
	Prepare delivery and fleet reports


Requirements


	OND/HND/BSc in Logistics, Business Admin or a related field
	3-5 years of experience in logistics/fleet coordination
	Strong communication and organizational skills
	Knowledge of Asaba and Delta State routes is an advantage.
	Ability to multitask and manage a team of drivers.


Method of Application

        Royal Hospital Ltd, a National Health Insurance Scheme accredited health care provider was established in 1973, it is one of the first ever private hospitals in Enugu state and has a rich history of care to many residents of the Eastern Nigeria and beyond.

It is situated in the prestigious G.R.A at the heart of Enugu on a hill overlooking the state secretariat, close to the Banking and business zones of Enugu city. Royal Hospital requires for immediate employment the following:

Job Position: PHARMACY TECHNICIAN 

Job Location: ENUGU

	 Possess a Pharmacy Technician Certificate from any recognized school of health
	Minimum of OND/HND in Pharmacy Technology.
	 Must be computer literate
	Must be proficient in typing
	 Must have good communication and interpersonal skills
	Must have basic skills in drug dispensing and counseling
	Must have good Knowledge of pharmacy law and medical terminology
	 Must be resident in Enugu or have accommodation available

	 Assisting with administrative tasks

	Cleaning of shelves and pharmacy premises
